job_details.Vacaturetitel: Software Engineer AI/ML - Intelligent Vehicle Assistant
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Build vehicle assistant response quality evaluation tools
     * Fine-tune AI/ML models to achieve the best response quality
     * Build and improve data pipelines, dashboards, and other internal tools
     * Participate in reviews of requirements, technical design, and code
     * Develop and maintain production systems including being on-call
job_details.full_text:
Software Engineer AI/ML - Intelligent Vehicle Assistant

* Build vehicle assistant response quality evaluation tools
     * Fine-tune AI/ML models to achieve the best response quality
     * Build and improve data pipelines, dashboards, and other internal tools
     * Participate in reviews of requirements, technical design, and code
     * Develop and maintain production systems including being on-call

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes fine-tuning AI/ML models, building and improving data pipelines, developing and maintaining production systems, and participating in code reviews. The mention of 'vehicle assistant' and 'response quality' strongly suggests a focus on generative AI applications, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in building and maintaining production-grade user-facing software systems.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Fine-tune AI/ML models to achieve the best response quality' directly relates to the process of adapting and improving machine learning models.
job_tasks.phrase: Fine-tune AI/ML models to achieve the best response quality

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Build and improve data pipelines, dashboards, and other internal tools' indicates responsibilities related to the creation and maintenance of data infrastructure and tools.
job_tasks.phrase: Build and improve data pipelines, dashboards, and other internal tools

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Build vehicle assistant response quality evaluation tools' implies the development of software applications to assess and improve AI model performance.
job_tasks.phrase: Build vehicle assistant response quality evaluation tools

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Develop and maintain production systems including being on-call' points to the responsibilities of managing and operating software in a live production environment, a key aspect of MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop and maintain production systems including being on-call

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Participate in reviews of requirements, technical design, and code' suggests collaboration and communication within a technical team.
job_tasks.phrase: Participate in reviews of requirements, technical design, and code
